sections.heading: Reciprocal Transfer Tax Act; construction; citation
sections.text: Sections 77-2007.01 and 77-2007.02 shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them. Sections 77-2007.01 and 77-2007.02 shall be known as the Uniform Reciprocal Tr

sections.heading: 77-2007.01 and 77-2007.02 shall be so interpreted and construed as to effectuate their general purpose to make uniform the law of those states which enact them
sections.text: Sections 77-2007.01 and 77-2007.02 shall be known as the Uniform Reciprocal Transfer Tax Act.
